name: One Way To Keep It Away
name_original: One Way To Keep It Away
description:
This game is for the One Button Game Jam

*couldnt make an html version sadly but gonna try

In This Game You are a NFT Collecter (Loser) and printed some NFTS

Then You Heard a Strange Noise OutSide

It is Some odd Looking figure looking at You with Its Sparkling eyes...

You called the police but they aint Fast

Survive and Keep it Away From You till The Police Comes

Note : its only for linux and macos
